sentence.Network_en: Geniality is my middle name. I rarely write a fierce word about any restaurant.
sentence.Network_cn: 与人为善是我最大的特点。我在给饭店写评语时很少用到激烈的言辞。

sentence.Network_en: Even to himself the geniality rang false and he came to a stop.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种亲切的语气他自己听来都显得虚伪，于是他停了下来。

sentence.Network_en: They said he is a pitiless , cold - blooded fellow , with no geniality in him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们说他是个毫无怜悯心 、 一点也不和蔼的冷血动物.

entry.tran: 友善的；真诚的；亲切的；和蔼可亲的
entry.def: Someone who is genial is kind and friendly.

example.ex: Bob was always genial and welcoming...
example.tran: 鲍勃总是那么友善热情。

example.ex: He was a warm-hearted friend and genial host.
example.tran: 他是个热心的朋友，也是友善待客的主人。

means.word_mean: 1. a disposition to be friendly and approachable (easy to talk to)

auth_sentence.content: Sometimes the geniality of whales even enhanced efficiency.

auth_sentence.content: His ordinary manner was a composed geniality.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,表示"某种性质,状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: absurd荒谬的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.荒谬

stems_affixes.value_cn: 权威,威信,权威人士,权力

electric电的+ity某种性质,状态等→电,电流

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性

stems_affixes.word_buile: familiar熟悉的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.熟悉,通晓,亲密,熟悉,精通
frugal节约的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.节约,节俭
genial亲切的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.和蔼,温和
infirm弱的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.虚弱
mendac说谎+ity某种性质,状态等→n.虚假
opportune凑巧的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.机会,时机
prob测试,证明+ity某种性质,状态等→[人]经得起证明和试验
rigid刚硬的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.固执,坚定,僵化
san健康的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.神志清楚
simpl=simple简单的+ic+ity某种性质,状态等→n.简单,简易,朴素,直率
venal贪财的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.唯利是图
